summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for scaffold-eth/se-2-challenges in August 2025

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Merged several updates to the multisig functionality, including backend endpoint updates and README enhancements.
  - Introduced a new GitHub action for revalidation of challenge README files upon changes.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Addressed issues with borrowing and flash loan logic in the README, ensuring clarity and functionality.
  - Fixed tooltip text wrapping for long contract paths in the Debug Contracts page.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on improving documentation and user guidance through README updates.
  - Enhancements to automation with GitHub actions for better deployment and validation processes.

topIssues.title: GH action: Redeploy challenge on autograder

topPRs.title: Fix: update borrowing and flash loan logic in README
Fix tooltip text wrapping for long contract paths
